section.title: Oracle RAC Cluster
section.para: Oracle 11G 不能直接链接 RAC 的 VIP
section.screen: jdbc:oracle:thin:@(DESCRIPTION = (ADDRESS_LIST = (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 172.16.10.10)(PORT = 1521)) (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 172.16.10.20)(PORT = 1521)) (LOAD_BALANCE = yes) ) (CONNECT_DATA = (SERVER = DEDICATED) (SERVICE_NAME = orcl.example.com) (FAILOVER_MODE =(TYPE = SELECT )(METHOD = BASIC)(RETRIES = 120)(DELAY = 5))) )

section.title: java.sql.SQLRecoverableException: IO Error: The Network Adapter could not establish the connection
section.para: 直接连接 RAC VIP 提示
section.screen: java.sql.SQLRecoverableException: IO Error: The Network Adapter could not establish the connection

section.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
section.para: 检查 /srv/jdk1.8.0_60/jre/lib/ext/ 是否有jdbc包，然后运行下面程序检查是否已经载入
